info.title: Compiler API
info.description: The Compiler API for the HandsOnCoding project, an open-source MOOC (Massive Open Online Courses) for multiple programming languages.

post.summary: Compile code written in a particular programming language.

201.description: The output of the compiled program.

400.description: An error occurred due to a bad request.

language.description: The identifier of the programming language. They are defined in the `languages.js` file.

code.description: The code that is going to be compiled.

input.description: If necessary, the console input for the submitted code.

msg.description: The output of the compiled program, if the code value is 10. If it isn't, a more descriptive message of the error code.

StatusCode.description:
Codes:
 * `-1` - Internal Error
 * `10` - Compiled correctly
 * `11` - Syntax error
 * `20` - Shell error
 * `21` - Compilation error
 * `30` - Timed Out
 * `40` - Request error
 * `50` - Invalid language
